DOC.criteria: Diagnosis lowgrade serous ovarian carcinoma OR invasive recurrence surgical resection borderline serous ovarian carcinoma Availability archival tumor specimen ( paraffin embed block ) central analysis evaluation mutation Age > 18 year Signed informed consent Highgrade serous , mucinous , endometrioid , nonlowgrade serous ovarian carcinoma Unavailability archival tumor specimen
